org.hps.recon.tracking

Class HelixConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.HelixConverter

  • public class HelixConverter
extends Object
    Convert a helix to a straight line track at a specified reference plane normal to the x axis. This code was developed for simulating the Heavy Photon Search experiment where the target is located outside the magnetic field volume.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • _xref

        private double _xref

    • Constructor Detail

      • HelixConverter

        public HelixConverter(double xref)
        Constructor for the HelixConverter used to convert helices to StraightLineTracks at the magnetic field boundary. The reference point xref identifies the x coordinate that specifies the magnetic field boundary. The StraightLineTracks produced by this class will use xref as their reference point.
        Parameters:
        xref - x coordinate that specifies the magnetic field boundary

        private Matrix MatrixTranspose(Matrix m)

        Returns:
